name: Iron Cog Liquid! (Beta)
description:
Welcome to Iron Cog Liquid! Rob infinite museums of their infinite gems in this tricky stealth game!

Play the normal amount(3 levels), or go way beyond(10+ levels) with exponential difficulty!

If you lose, it will restart the level with a different layout!

CONTROLS:

WASD to Move, SPACE to toggle which gems you have robbed

INSTRUCTIONS:

Rob the light green, pink and light blue gems and escape through the red vent to win! The dark green bush lets you lose the guard's attention when he is after you! The guard is the dark blue circle! Enter his view, and he will chase you! The black lines are tripwires! If you touch them, they will alert the guard and stick you in place!

MUSIC BY ME

ALPHA 2 PATCH NOTES:

-Added tripwires!

-Small graphics update!

-Bug Fixes!
